00020 #ifndef RDK2_SERIALIZATION_XML_UTILS
00021 #define RDK2_SERIALIZATION_XML_UTILS
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <libxml/xmlreader.h>
00025 
00026 #define XML_CHECK_ERROR(assertion, msg, retonerr) \
00027     if ((assertion)) { \
00028         xmlErrorPtr e = xmlGetLastError(); \
00029         RDK_ERROR_STREAM(string(msg) << (e ? e->message : "")); \
00030         return retonerr; \
00031     }
00032 
00033 #define XML_ENCODING "ISO-8859-1"
00034 #define XML_NAMESPACE_PREFIX BAD_CAST "rdk"
00035 #define XML_NAMESPACE_URI_ROOT BAD_CAST "http://sied.dis.uniroma1.it/rdk"
00036 #define XML_NAMESPACE_URI 0
00037 
00038 xmlChar* xmlEncode(const char* s);
00039 xmlChar* xmlDecode(const char* s);

00041 void encode64(const char* input, size_t n, std::string& output, bool add_crlf);
00042 void decode64(const std::string& input, std::string& output, size_t& n);
